body.content:
Hello,
Good Morning,
I am writing to you in good faith, My name is Michael Dos Santos and I am a
solicitor at law, I am making this proposal in respect to the death of my
late client who died leaving a huge sum of money in a bank and after
unsuccessful attempt to locate his relatives I decided to contact you.
I need your assistance in retrieving the funds with the bank as I was
mandated to present his next of kin or they will transfer the inheritance
to the treasury.
I wish to know if you are interested and willing to help me, then I will
explain in detail about the procedure.
Looking forward to hearing from you.
Regards.
